name: West Hollywood
shortDescription: A trendy, vibrant city known for its nightlife, arts scene, and inclusive community.
fullDescription: West Hollywood, or WeHo, is a dynamic urban enclave celebrated for its lively nightlife, cutting-edge art galleries, and diverse cultural events. Situated between Beverly Hills and Hollywood, it features walkable streets lined with trendy boutiques, popular restaurants, and iconic music venues. Known for its progressive spirit and strong LGBTQ+ community, West Hollywood offers a unique blend of entertainment, history, and modern living. The city is also home to beautiful residential neighborhoods, excellent public transit options, and a thriving creative scene.
heroImageAlt: Sunset view of West Hollywood cityscape with palm trees

neighborhoods.name: Hollywood
neighborhoods.description: Famous entertainment district with theaters, nightlife, and tourist attractions.

neighborhoods.name: Beverly Hills
neighborhoods.description: Upscale city known for luxury shopping, celebrity homes, and fine dining.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Rodeo Drive shopping street in Beverly Hills

neighborhoods.name: Silver Lake
neighborhoods.description: Hip neighborhood with trendy cafes, arts scene, and scenic reservoir.

neighborhoods.name: Westwood
neighborhoods.description: Home to UCLA, with theaters, museums, and lively college town vibe.

highlights.title: Sunset Strip
highlights.description: Famous stretch known for nightlife, music venues, and vibrant atmosphere.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Sunset Strip at night with neon lights

highlights.title: West Hollywood Design District
highlights.description: High-end shopping and art galleries in a trendy, walkable neighborhood.

highlights.title: LGBTQ+ Events & Culture
highlights.description: A welcoming city known for Pride celebrations, community centers, and inclusive vibe.

highlights.title: Pacific Design Center
highlights.description: Architectural landmark with design showrooms, events, and art exhibitions.

faqs.question: What is West Hollywood known for?
faqs.answer: West Hollywood is famous for its vibrant nightlife, arts scene, and LGBTQ+ friendly community.

faqs.question: How is the real estate market in West Hollywood?
faqs.answer: West Hollywood has a competitive market with a mix of luxury condos and historic homes.

faqs.question: What are popular attractions in West Hollywood?
faqs.answer: The Sunset Strip, Pacific Design Center, and numerous theaters and music venues attract visitors year-round.

faqs.question: Is West Hollywood walkable and transit-friendly?
faqs.answer: Yes, it has a walkable layout with access to public transit and bike lanes throughout the city.
